meanings.definition: A person who struggles or fights against adversity.
meanings.sent1: The young struggler never gives up, even when faced with challenges.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to support the struggler during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The little struggler tried to carry a huge bag of groceries, looking determined but slightly comical.
meanings.sent4: She was a lone struggler in a sea of indifference, pushing against the tide of apathy.
meanings.sent5: The image of the struggler, with sweat on their brow and determination in their eyes, stayed with me.

meanings.definition: One who has difficulty or makes a great effort to achieve something.
meanings.sent1: The young struggler put in extra hours to improve their grades.
meanings.sent2: The struggler faced many obstacles but never lost hope.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy struggler tripped over their own feet, causing laughter all around.
meanings.sent4: She was a silent struggler, battling her inner demons with every step she took.
meanings.sent5: The determined struggler climbed the mountain, each step a testament to their perseverance.
